title: Just another temple
review: Nothing khas about it. Just an average place. If you not much spiritual then you would find it boring.

title: nothing special
review: You will need to climb to reach the temple, nothing special about the temple, great view and a religiously sound place to hang around.

title: nice temple
review: its another nice temple in mussoorie. its a very old temple wit beautiful scenic view.Other than that, nothing special about it just a clean temple by the side of the road.

title: On the hill
review: This place was a part of the tour of uttrakhand tourism. The temple was on a hill and we needed to climb stairs to reach there. The view from the temple was nice.

title: nice temple in mussoorie
review: it is very old temple. it is very clean temple not much crowed. it is not important to visit but if you are religious you can give 10 minutes here

title: good tempel with great view
review: this temple was not in our list but we visited and really we liked this temple. very peaceful place and less crowd. and view from here was awesome. visit if you have time

title: Temple of the Snake God
review: Nag Devta Temple is an ancient temple and is dedicated to God of Snakes.Every year,the temple is decorated beautifully on the occasion of Nag Panchmi.One can also witness beautiful views of Doon valley and Mussoorie town from here.

title: SNAKE GOD
review: This snake temple is about six kilometers from Mussoorie on the way to Dehradun. We had to take one kilometer diversion from the main road to reach this temple. We parked our car and walked about 100 yards with some stairs to go up to the temple. This place is secluded and peaceful. During festivals  crowd is seen. We enjoyed nice scenic view all round the temple.

title: peaceful place
review: has excellent view one can see whole dehradun (doons) from here winds were fast flowing when i visited the place that is why i nearly spend  half an hour here

title: Hill view is good
review: You need to climb-up the hill to visit this temple but its worth,hill view during cloudy weather from temple is awesome.

title: Our recent visit here
review: We visited this temple while our stay here. One has to walk a long distance to reach the temple from the car parking. The temple was really nice. Some puja was going on when we visited this temple.

title: great views
review: situated very closely on hathipaon road.. is very well built.. it has a huge amount of visitors.. nag structures are everywhere.. the views from the top are breath taking..

title: Like other temple, nothing special
review: Though view from temple was nice, but the temple was just like other temples, nothing special to visit..

title: sunder temple on hills
review: Nag devta temple is very beatiful temple situated about six 6 kilometer from musoorie .it is having beautiful scenery.

title: NAG Temple
review: Its a beautiful old temple in Mussoorie, where you will get a nice, calm and religious atmosphere. You need to climb some steps to reach this temple.

title: Very near to The Perfect Hideout
review: Awesome location. There was five year old kid as a purohit there. No shops around to divert your mind unnecessarily.

title: Religious Place.
review: An ancient temple situated about six kms from Mussoorie. It provides a charming view of Doon Valley &  Mussoorie town.

title: On way to Company garden
review: We were on our way to Company garden when we came across this temple. We went inside but there was no pundit so we made our offerings and came out. There must be a season when this temple would be visited most. When I visited (Nov) we spotted another family.

title: A stopover for the religious you
review: If you are religious then you can stop for a while here. The views that you get while reaching this place from the Mall Road are nice as well. Other than that, nothing special about it just a clean temple by the side of the road.

title: Nothing romantic but fully devotional
review: Nothing romantic but fully devotional. Rest is your choice. You may skip this if you believe that God  is everywhere.

title: A Sacred Place Of Lord Shiva
review: Naag Devta Temple is an ancient temple dedicated to Lord Shiva...It is situated on Cart Mackenjee Road....It is 6 KM from Mussoorie on way to Dehradoon...This place offers enchanting views of Mussoorie..

title: Friendly Temple Visit
review: We were greeted by 2 Temple workers.  We had a short visit, had small Arti prayer and gave some small INR for the Temple.

title: Happy Valley Tibetan Buddhist Temple
review: I'm not sure if the Nag Devta Temple is the same as the Happy Valley Tibetan Buddhist Temple, but the Tibetan Temple was one of the most peaceful places in Mussoorie.

title: religious place
review: not maintain well. place is dirty. we visited during Navratra festival so their was big crowed. i will never visit again

title: Secluded place
review: About six kilometers from Mussoorie on the way to Dehradun, there is a one kilometer diversion to go to this temple by a motorable road. You will have to walk about 100yards down the road and then go up some stairs to see this temple. Except during festivals, it is a very peaceful place. Neat and clean. You can have a nice scenic view all round the temple. It takes about half an hour extra travel time between Dehradun and Mussoorie but you can see one more attraction.

title: Nice place
review: It's a nice quiet temple dedicated to the snake devta. Nice interesting place. I liked the calm and religious atmosphere of this place.

title: In the jungles
review: Hello, this temple is although far away from Mussoorie town, one can reach there. It is in the jungle on the mountain.

title: good temple
review: awesome temple

title: Lord Shiva Temple
review: Its 6 km from Mussoorie on the way to Dehradun.  This is a very peaceful place ,i loved this place . Basically its a lord Shiva temple.

title: Serine and calm temple
review: - This is a temple situated on the Hathipaon road. The area is clean and calm.

title: Beautiful Location
review: Situated at a beautiful location away from crowded mall. The drive from Naag Devta Temple to clouds end and further to gandhi chowk is full of nature. Thats where you actually get the feel of real Mussoorie as a hill station.
